review.description: Tendon in chili oil hands down a winner. Such good authentic Chinese and will be a solid go to from now on.
review.author: Cam R.

review.description: The place is always crowded and is not worth the wait. Even the takeaway window has a long wait. The Food is average and service was subpar. The Hostess had attitude and was not friendly.
review.author: Ivan A.

review.description: Great meal, reasonable wait. Pea tips with garlic, salt and pepper scallops and wontons in chili oil were especially good.
review.author: Linda R.
